context: Hello! I loved The Greatest Showman (2017) . Could you recommend any musicals like it?
The The Greatest Showman (2017) was an excellent move! Have you ever seen Moulin Rouge! (2001)?
I haven't, but I've always wanted to see it. Can you recommend anything else?
Into the Woods (2014) is another excellent pick if you haven't already seen that one.
I have seen that one! It was great! Do you have any other recommendations?
resp: Another one of my favorite musicals is Les Misérables (2012). Which of course also has Hugh Jackman.
